SELECT a.`ID` AS id,a.`PERSON_ID` AS personId,b.`ID_CODE` AS idCode,b.`EMP_NAME` AS empName FROM ${lppTableName} a,${lpTableName} b WHERE a.`PERSON_ID`=b.`ID` AND a.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND b.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND a.`EMP_TYPE`=0 AND b.`ID_CODE` IS NOT NULL AND a.`PROJECT_ID`=#{PROJECT_ID}
AND (b.`IDPHOTO_SCAN` IS NULL OR b.`IDPHOTO_SCAN2` IS NULL)
AND b.`ID_PHOTO` IS NULL
AND a.`FACEPHOTO` IS NULL
